languages.text: "Не думай, моя забава, что я дам тебе легко умереть". {n}Суккуба хватает хрипящего Маражая за волосы и с силой задирает ему голову.{/n} "Нас ждет много, много часов наедине... возможно, я не найду в себе сил расстаться с тобой, и ты станешь моей любимой разумной лежанкой, Эзирраеш. Время покажет".

traits.locale_text: "Не думай, моя забава, что я дам тебе легко умереть". {n}Суккуба хватает хрипящего Маражая за волосы и с силой задирает ему голову.{/n} "Нас ждет много, много часов наедине... возможно, я не найду в себе сил расстаться с тобой, и ты станешь моей любимой разумной лежанкой, Эширраэш. Время покажет".
traits.speaker: Sinistroia

languages.text: "Do not think I will let you die easily, my pet." {n}The Succubus grabs the wheezing Marazhai by the hair and roughly pulls his head back.{/n} "We have many, many hours to spend together... perhaps I will not find it in me to part with you, and you will become my favourite sentient lounge chair, Aezyrraesh. Only time will tell."
languages.original_text: "Не думай, моя забава, что я дам тебе легко умереть". {n}Суккуба хватает хрипящего Маражая за волосы и с силой задирает ему голову.{/n} "Нас ждет много, много часов наедине... возможно, я не найду в себе сил расстаться с тобой, и ты станешь моей любимой разумной лежанкой, Эзирраеш. Время покажет".

traits.locale_text: "Do not think I would let you die easily, my pet." {n}The Succubus grabs the wheezing Marazhai by the hair and pulls his head back with force.{/n} "We have many, many hours to spend together... perhaps I will not find it in me to part with you, and you will become my favourite sentient resting bench, Aezyrraesh. Only time will tell."
traits.speaker: Sinistroia

traits.locale_text: "Do not think I would let you die easily, my pet." {n}The Succubus grabs the wheezing Marazhai by the hair and pulls his head back with force.{/n} "We have many, many hours to spend together... perhaps I will not find it in me to part with you, and you will become my favourite sentient resting bench, Aezyrraesh. Only time will tell."
traits.speaker: Sinistroia

traits.locale_text: "Do not think I will let you die easily, my pet." {n}The Succubus grabs the wheezing Marazhai by the hair and roughly pulls his head back.{/n} "We have many, many hours to spend together... perhaps I will not find it in me to part with you, and you will become my favourite sentient lounge chair, Aezyrraesh. Only time will tell."
traits.speaker: Sinistroia

traits.locale_text: "Do not think I will let you die easily, my pet." {n}The Succubus grabs the wheezing Marazhai by the hair and roughly pulls his head back.{/n} "We have many, many hours to spend together... perhaps I will not find it in me to part with you, and you will become my favourite sentient lounge chair, Aezyrraesh. Only time will tell."
traits.speaker: Sinistroia

traits.locale_text: "Do not think I will let you die easily, my pet." {n}The Succubus grabs the wheezing Marazhai by the hair and roughly pulls his head back.{/n} "We have many, many hours to spend together... perhaps I will not find it in me to part with you, and you will become my favourite sentient lounge chair, Aezyrraesh. Only time will tell."
traits.speaker: Sinistroia

languages.text: "Glaubt ja nicht, dass ich so leicht sterben werde, mein Haustier." {n}Der Succubus packt den keuchenden Marazhai bei den Haaren und zieht ihm ruppig den in den Nacken.{/n} "Wir werden noch viele, viele Stunden zusammen verbringen ... Vielleicht bringe ich es nicht übers Herz, mich von Euch zu trennen, und Ihr werdet zu meinem liebsten lebenden Sessel, Aezyrraesh. Die Zeit wird es zeigen."
languages.original_text: "Do not think I will let you die easily, my pet." {n}The Succubus grabs the wheezing Marazhai by the hair and roughly pulls his head back.{/n} "We have many, many hours to spend together... perhaps I will not find it in me to part with you, and you will become my favourite sentient lounge chair, Aezyrraesh. Only time will tell."

traits.locale_text: "Glaubt ja nicht, dass ich so leicht sterben werde, mein Haustier." {n}"Der Succubus packt den keuchenden Marazhai bei den Haaren und zieht ihm ruppig den in den Nacken.{/n} "Wir werden noch viele, viele Stunden zusammen verbringen ... Vielleicht bringe ich es nicht übers Herz, mich von Euch zu trennen, und Ihr werdet zu meinem liebsten lebenden Sessel, Aezyrraesh. Die Zeit wird es zeigen."
traits.speaker: Sinistroia

languages.text: “别以为我会让你死得很轻松，我的宠物。”{n}希斯索莉亚抓住玛拉斋的头发，粗暴地将他的头向后拽去。{/n}“接下来，我们还有很多、很多时间可以一起度过……或许我并不想和你分开，我准备把你做成我最喜欢的活体躺椅，艾泽拉什。我们走着瞧吧。”
languages.original_text: "Do not think I will let you die easily, my pet." {n}The Succubus grabs the wheezing Marazhai by the hair and roughly pulls his head back.{/n} "We have many, many hours to spend together... perhaps I will not find it in me to part with you, and you will become my favourite sentient lounge chair, Aezyrraesh. Only time will tell."

traits.locale_text: “别以为我会让你死得很轻松，我的宠物。”{n}希斯索莉亚抓住玛拉斋的头发，粗暴地将他的头向后拽去。{/n}“接下来，我们还有很多、很多时间可以一起度过……或许我并不想和你分开，我准备把你做成我最喜欢的活体躺椅，艾泽拉什。我们走着瞧吧。”
traits.speaker: Sinistroia

languages.text: « Je ne vous laisserai pas crever facilement, esclave. » {n}La succube saisit la crinière de Marazhai et tire brusquement sa tête crachotante en arrière.{/n} « Nous avons un temps considérable à passer ensemble... Si je ne parviens pas à me séparer de vous, je ferai peut-être de vous ma chaise longue vivante préférée, Aezyrraesh. Nous verrons bien ce que l'avenir vous réserve. »
languages.original_text: "Do not think I will let you die easily, my pet." {n}The Succubus grabs the wheezing Marazhai by the hair and roughly pulls his head back.{/n} "We have many, many hours to spend together... perhaps I will not find it in me to part with you, and you will become my favourite sentient lounge chair, Aezyrraesh. Only time will tell."

traits.locale_text: « Je ne vous laisserai pas crever facilement, esclave. » {n}La succube saisit la crinière de Marazhai et tire brusquement sa tête crachotante en arrière.{/n} « Nous avons un temps considérable à passer ensemble... Si je ne parviens pas à me séparer de vous, je ferai peut-être de vous ma chaise longue vivante préférée, Aezyrraesh. Nous verrons bien ce que l'avenir vous réserve. »
traits.speaker: Sinistroia

languages.text: «No creas que te dejaré morir fácilmente, mascotita mía». {n}La súcubo agarra a un jadeante Marazhai y tira con fuerza de su cabeza hacia atrás.{/n} «Tenemos muchas, muchas horas por delante... Y tal vez no me deshaga de ti. Podrías convertirte en mi diván viviente favorito, Aezyrraesh. Solo el tiempo lo dirá».
languages.original_text: "Do not think I will let you die easily, my pet." {n}The Succubus grabs the wheezing Marazhai by the hair and roughly pulls his head back.{/n} "We have many, many hours to spend together... perhaps I will not find it in me to part with you, and you will become my favourite sentient lounge chair, Aezyrraesh. Only time will tell."

traits.locale_text: «No creas que te dejaré morir fácilmente, mascotita mía». {n}La súcubo agarra a un jadeante Marazhai y tira con fuerza de su cabeza hacia atrás.{/n} «Tenemos muchas, muchas horas por delante... Y tal vez no me deshaga de ti. Podrías convertirte en mi diván viviente favorito, Aezyrraesh. Solo el tiempo lo dirá».
traits.speaker: Sinistroia

languages.text: 「簡単に死ねると思うなよ」{n}サキュバスは息を切らすマラズハイの髪を掴み、乱暴に顔を引き上げる。{/n}「共に過ごす時間はまだまだたくさんある…おそらくお前を手放すということはないだろうな。お前は私のお気に入りの生けるラウンジチェアになるんだ、アエジレシュ。時間がたてばわかるだろう」
languages.original_text: "Do not think I will let you die easily, my pet." {n}The Succubus grabs the wheezing Marazhai by the hair and roughly pulls his head back.{/n} "We have many, many hours to spend together... perhaps I will not find it in me to part with you, and you will become my favourite sentient lounge chair, Aezyrraesh. Only time will tell."

traits.locale_text: 「簡単に死ねると思うなよ」{n}サキュバスは息を切らすマラズハイの髪を掴み、乱暴に顔を引き上げる。{/n}「共に過ごす時間はまだまだたくさんある…おそらくお前を手放すということはないだろうな。お前は私のお気に入りの生けるラウンジチェアになるんだ、アエジレシュ。時間がたてばわかるだろう」
traits.speaker: Sinistroia

languages.text: "Evcil hayvanım, bu kadar kolay ölmene müsaade edecek değilim." {n}Sakkubus, hırıldayarak soluyan Marazhai'ı saçından kavrıyor ve kafasını sertçe çekiyor.{/n} "Beraber daha çok zaman geçireceğiz. Belki de senden ayrılmaya yüreğim elvermez; seni en gözde, akil eşyam yaparım Aezyrraesh. Ne olacağını zamanla göreceğiz."
languages.original_text: "Do not think I will let you die easily, my pet." {n}The Succubus grabs the wheezing Marazhai by the hair and roughly pulls his head back.{/n} "We have many, many hours to spend together... perhaps I will not find it in me to part with you, and you will become my favourite sentient lounge chair, Aezyrraesh. Only time will tell."

traits.locale_text: "Evcil hayvanım, senin bu kadar kolay ölmene izin vereceğimi sanma." {n}Sakkubus hırıldayarak soluyan Marazhai'ı saçından kavrıyor ve kafasını sertçe çekiyor.{/n} "Daha beraber geçireceğimiz çok ama çok zaman var. Belki de senden ayrılmaya yüreğim elvermez ve en gözde yaşayan salon sandalyem hâline gelirsin Aezyrraesh. Bunu zaman gösterecek."
traits.speaker: Sinistroia
